module.name: vPreProcess
module.description: Removes salt and pepper noise from the event stream
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Removes salt and pepper noise from the event stream. If an event is the only one occured within its surrounding (spatialSize parameter) in a certain temporal window (temporalSize parameter), it is ignored.

param.desc: Specifies the stem name of ports created by the module.
Number of pixels on the y-axis of the sensor.
Number of pixels on the x-axis of the sensor.
Size of the spatial window around the event
How long the filter will look for events in the past within the spatial window

input.description: Input event stream to be filtered
